thread.title: Leverkusen 2 Atletico 4: Saul’s stunning opener helps put Spanish side in cruise control in five-goal thriller
thread.title_full: Leverkusen 2 Atletico 4: Saul’s stunning opener helps put Spanish side in cruise control in five-goal thriller

author: rforrester
title: Leverkusen 2 Atletico 4: Saul’s stunning opener helps put Spanish side in cruise control in five-goal thriller
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ATLETICO MADRID have one foot firmly in the last eight of the Champions League after scoring four away goals in Germany. 
Saul opened the scoring with a spectacular strike before Antoine Griezmann’s 17th goal of the season, Kevin Gameiro’s penalty and a Fernando Torres header rounded off a tough night for Bayer Leverkusen. AP:Associated Press Saul cut inside and produced a stunning finish into the far corner Reuters 2 Antoine Griezmann celebrates doubling Atletico Madrid’s advantage 
A Sebastian Savic own-goal gave the German side a glimmer of hope heading into the second-leg after Karim Bellarabi bought the hosts back into the tie. 
It took just 17 minutes to open the scoring when Saul picked up the ball on the right and charged at Dragovic before cutting in on his left and bending it beautifully into the top corner. 
More to follow…
